keyMoments.title: Arrival at Gyoncorde Plaza
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi and his brothers dramatically arrive at Gyoncorde Plaza to challenge the New Fish-Man Pirates and rescue their father.
keyMoments.significance: The arrival of the royal family's strongest warriors provides hope for the citizens.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Energy Steroid-Enhanced Sea Beasts
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi and his brothers effortlessly defeat all of the drug-enhanced sea beasts, demonstrating their superior combat skills.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the princes as formidable warriors capable of defeating enhanced creatures.

keyMoments.title: Speech on Peace and Discrimination
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi delivers an impassioned speech condemning Hody's ideology of hatred and praising the citizens who chose peace over revenge.
keyMoments.significance: Articulates the central philosophical conflict of the Fish-Man Island arc and carries forward his mother Queen Otohime's vision.
keyMoments.quote: You and your folk are the weakest on the island! The people try to ignore their history of discrimination by humans and endure the pain of losing Fisher Tiger and Queen Otohime to humans. You will never understand their kindness!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Energy Steroid-Enhanced Officers
keyMoments.description: Despite his natural strength and skill, Fukaboshi is brutally defeated by Hody's officers who have consumed Energy Steroids.
keyMoments.significance: A crushing defeat that eliminates hope of conventional rescue and demonstrates the corrupting power of Energy Steroids.

abilities.description: Fukaboshi uses advanced fish-man combat techniques with his trident.
Skilled wielder of a trident weapon, similar to his father Neptune.

reveals.information: Believes that the citizens who endure discrimination and choose peace over hatred are the strongest, while those who perpetuate hatred are the weakest.

keyMoments.title: Arrival at Gyoncorde Plaza
keyMoments.description: Ryuboshi arrives at Gyoncorde Plaza with his brothers to challenge the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Joins his brothers in the attempt to rescue their father and defend Fish-Man Island.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Sea Beasts
keyMoments.description: Ryuboshi helps defeat the Energy Steroid-enhanced sea beasts with his brothers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates his combat prowess as one of the Neptune Army's elite warriors.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Officers
keyMoments.description: Ryuboshi is defeated by the drug-enhanced New Fish-Man Pirates officers.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the crushing defeat that leaves the royal family without defenders.

abilities.description: Ryuboshi wields two long rapiers with great skill.

keyMoments.title: Arrival at Gyoncorde Plaza
keyMoments.description: Manboshi arrives at Gyoncorde Plaza with his brothers to challenge the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Joins his brothers in the attempt to rescue their father and defend Fish-Man Island.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Sea Beasts
keyMoments.description: Manboshi helps defeat the Energy Steroid-enhanced sea beasts with his brothers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates his combat prowess as one of the Neptune Army's elite warriors.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Officers
keyMoments.description: Manboshi is defeated by the drug-enhanced New Fish-Man Pirates officers.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the crushing defeat that leaves the royal family without defenders.

abilities.description: Manboshi wields a massive medieval-style longsword with great skill.

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Transformed Appearance Revealed
keyMoments.description: Hody displays his drastically transformed physical appearance after overdosing on Energy Steroids, with bleached-white hair and massively increased musculature.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the extreme power boost and physical transformation from Energy Steroid abuse.
keyMoments.quote: Neptune, you used yourself as a shield to protect your own soldiers from harm. You are unworthy to be king!

keyMoments.title: Victory Over the Princes
keyMoments.description: Hody watches as his Energy Steroid-enhanced officers brutally defeat the three princes, laughing in victory over the royal family.
keyMoments.significance: Cements Hody's control over Fish-Man Island and eliminates conventional hope of rescue.

reveals.information: After overdosing on Energy Steroids, Hody's physical appearance has drastically changed, resulting in a more muscular body and bleached-white hair with tremendous strength increase.
Hody mocks compassionate leadership and believes that using oneself as a shield to protect soldiers is a sign of weakness rather than strength.

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Plots Destruction After Rejection
keyMoments.description: Devastated by Shirahoshi's rejection, Vander Decken shaves his head in grief but then formulates a plan to destroy everything using the Flying Dutchman.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Vander Decken's transition from obsessed suitor to destructive nihilist, setting up the next phase of the crisis.
keyMoments.quote: I've got an idea to destroy everything!

reveals.information: Driven to madness by Shirahoshi's rejection, Vander Decken transitions to a destructive mindset, planning to destroy everything.

keyMoments.title: Remains Captive After Army Defeat
keyMoments.description: Neptune remains held captive by the New Fish-Man Pirates after his army is completely defeated.
keyMoments.significance: The king's continued captivity represents the complete dominance of the New Fish-Man Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Warns His Sons
keyMoments.description: Despite being captive, Neptune warns his sons about the danger of the Energy Steroid-enhanced enemies.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Neptune's fatherly concern even in his own dire situation.
keyMoments.quote: Be careful of the beasts and the officers! They all have taken Energy Steroids!

keyMoments.title: Watches Sons' Defeat
keyMoments.description: Neptune watches helplessly as his three sons are brutally defeated by Hody's officers.
keyMoments.significance: A tragic moment showing a father unable to protect his children.

reveals.information: Neptune uses himself as a shield to protect his soldiers from harm, demonstrating compassionate and self-sacrificing leadership.

keyMoments.title: Consumes Energy Steroids
keyMoments.description: Daruma consumes Energy Steroid pills to enhance his strength before fighting the princes.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the widespread use of performance-enhancing drugs among the New Fish-Man Pirates officers.

keyMoments.title: Defeats the Princes
keyMoments.description: Enhanced by Energy Steroids, Daruma helps defeat the three princes with overwhelming force.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the corrupting power advantage that drugs provide over natural strength.

keyMoments.title: Consumes Energy Steroids
keyMoments.description: Dosun consumes Energy Steroid pills to enhance his strength before fighting the princes.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the widespread use of performance-enhancing drugs among the New Fish-Man Pirates officers.

keyMoments.title: Defeats the Princes
keyMoments.description: Enhanced by Energy Steroids, Dosun helps defeat the three princes with overwhelming force.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the corrupting power advantage that drugs provide over natural strength.

keyMoments.title: Defeats the Princes
